interventions are completed for that visit before she leaves the facility. This will help the provider to fill all the 
relevant columns for ANC for the woman on the day of the visit and while she is there. Filling this register at the 
end of the ANC day/session must be avoided as that may lead to missing out on the important information of the 
pregnant woman. Also, there will be chance of wrong entries. This missed/wrong info
